p: For evaluation of ZIKV rE immunogenicity, mice were immunized subcutaneously in the flank with 5 µg soluble rE M ( n = 5), 5 µg rE M + 500 µg alum (Alhydrogel, Invivogen) ( n = 5), 5 µg rE D ( n = 5), 5 µg rE D + 500 µg alum ( n = 5), or PBS ( n = 3). All groups received three immunizations (day 0, 21, and 63), and serum samples were collected on day 21, 28, 70, 77, 84, 91, 98, 105, and 112 by submandibular bleed.
